programme.title: The Suicide Squad
programme.desc: Regeringen sender de farligste superskurke i verden til den fjerntliggende ø Corto Maltese. Bevæbnet med højteknologiske våben vandrer de gennem den farlige jungle på en eftersøgnings- og ødelæggelsesmission.

programme.title: Ghost Adventures
programme.desc: Det frygtløse hold bag Ghost Adventures er tilbage! I hver episode rejser spøgelsesjægerne Zak Bagans og Aaron Goodwin sammen med teknikerne Billy Tolley og Jay Wasley til en hjemsøgt destination, hvor de mødes med lokale, øjenvidner og eksperter for at undersøge spøgelseshistorierne fra hvert sted. Ved hjælp af den nyeste, videnskabelige teknologi og gadgets sætter holdet deres efterforskning i gang om natten, hvor de konfronterer den paranormale aktivitet og dokumenterer beviserne i håbet om at afdække sandheden bag hvert af de hjemsøgende mysterier.

programme.desc: Todd Hoffman og hans kammerater risikerede alt i Sydamerika og tabte. programme.title: Saved By The Barn
programme.desc: Dan McKernan forlod bylivet og vendte tilbage til Michigan. Her startede han et reservat for dyr i nød på sin historiske familiegård.

programme.title: Shark After Dark
programme.desc: Hajer er kendt for at være aktive og aggressive om dagen, men man ved ikke ret meget om, hvad de laver om natten. Dykkere tager ned i den mørke afgrund for at undersøge sagen.

programme.title: Legend of Deep Blue
programme.desc: Hajeksperterne Brandon McMillan og Jimi Partington vender tilbage til Guadalupe for at finde den største hvide haj i verden, Deep Blue. Kan de opklare mysteriet?

programme.title: Bad Dog
programme.desc: Ligegyldigt hvor ofte hunde overlister os, gør os flove, æder os ud af huset osv., kan vi ikke lade være med at elske dem ubetinget, og vi er stadig ligeså vilde med dem.

programme.title: Alaskan Bush People
programme.desc: I denne helt unikke række af programmer, afsløres hidtil usete optagelser af familien Brown imens de gør sig klar til den første sommer. Derudover vises et eksklusivt smugkig på de kommende afsnit.

programme.title: Alaskan Bush People
programme.desc: I denne helt unikke række af programmer, afsløres hidtil usete optagelser af familien Brown imens de gør sig klar til den første sommer. Derudover vises et eksklusivt smugkig på de kommende afsnit.

programme.title: Fish or Die

programme.title: Saved By The Barn
programme.desc: Dan McKernan forlod bylivet og vendte tilbage til Michigan. Her startede han et reservat for dyr i nød på sin historiske familiegård.

programme.title: Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet
programme.desc: Dr. Jeff og hans dedikerede medarbejdere fra Planned Pethood Plus tager alle slags dyrepatienter under kærlig behandling i Denver, Colorado.

programme.title: Tanked
programme.desc: Tanked dumber seerne ned i de mest spændende akvarier. Acrylic Tank Manufacturing, ATM er verdensmestre i akvarier! De har kreeret de mest banebrydende og ekstraordinære akvarier. Kunderne er krævende og lokationen nogle gange ligeså. Holdet rejser landet rundt for at bringe havet i øjenhøjde på gæster, som besøger så forskellige steder, som casinoer, kirker, museer og zoologiske haver.

programme.title: Animal Cops Miami
programme.desc: Efterforskerne svømmer blandt alligatorer for at forsøge at redde en såret alligator. Senere reddes 400 husdyr i Miamis største redningsaktion nogensinde!

programme.title: Animal Cops Miami
programme.desc: En dramatisk redning for at redde en søkos luffe afslører en hemmelighed. Samtidig er efterforsker Casadevall på jagt efter krybskytter, som har dræbt adskillige kreaturer.

programme.title: Game On
programme.desc: De texanske vildtvogtere bekæmper kriminalitet og beskytter statens naturressourcer. På grænsen fjerner vogterne illegale ruser fra floden, mens de ser efter narkotikasmuglere.

programme.title: The Graham Norton Show
programme.desc: The irreverent BAFTA award-winning chat show hosted by Graham Norton. Each episode is brim full of chat, comedy, celebrity gossip and hilarious absurdities. programme.title: Morning Live
programme.desc: Conversation, advice and great company to make your morning.

programme.title: Rip Off Britain
programme.desc: The Rip Off Britain team is ready to tackle the issues that most matter to you - from bills and bad customer service, to holidays and food.

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer
programme.desc: The show follows new and seasoned buyers as they bid on run-down properties at auction, hoping to transform them into profitable investments. Cameras follow each step of their renovation journey, capturing the highs and lows as they work toward selling or renting the homes. Some succeed with impressive results, while others face unexpected setbacks and financial losses.

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: The long-running game show sees more rival antique collectors test their skills at spotting a bargain. Two teams - the reds and the blues - set out with just £300 and one hour to scour an antiques fair and buy three items to sell at auction. An antiques expert guides each team, giving them hints and tips on what to buy in the hope they make more profit than their rivals when their items go under the hammer.

programme.title: The Marvellous Miniature Workshop
programme.desc: Its the little things that mean the most. Sara Cox and a team of magnificent makers bring cherished memories back to life. The models may be tiny, but the joy they bring is huge.

programme.title: Make It at Market
programme.desc: Follow a select group of amateur makers as they are mentored through the practicalities and pitfalls of turning a hobby into a business. The expert mentors and show host will guide them through what it takes to transform their hobby into a business, giving them the knowledge and opportunity to transform their lives.

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: People seeking more peace and quiet are trading the bustling city for a new life in the picturesque countryside. The presenters travel across Britain in search of their dream home. House hunters are shown two properties they like, but the surprise house is something completely different than what they requested and could potentially turn their entire search upside down.

programme.title: The Bidding Room
programme.desc: Nigel Havers presides as sellers come face to face with five dealers who battle it out to make the highest bid.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Some of Britains leading antiques experts take to the road in a collection of classic cars. Along the way, they compete against each other to make the most money and buy and sell the most antiques. Each expert has a budget of £200, which they must increase as they sell more items. They compete individually, but travel together in pairs. Expertise, egos and reputations are at stake, and the series concludes with a spectacular auction finale.

programme.desc: A quiz where contestants try to score as few points as possible by answering questions in a way that is unique to them

programme.title: Joins BBC News
programme.desc: Joining the BBCs rolling news channel for a night of news, with bulletins on the hour and the headlines every 15 minutes

programme.title: Life Below Zero: Canada
programme.desc: Based on the four-time Emmy-winning format, Life Below Zero: Northern Territories is a compelling documentary about people who live off the grid in remote regions of northern Canada. The series follows a diverse group from different backgrounds, including First Nations. Get an unfiltered glimpse into their rugged daily lives, as these intrepid characters use traditional survival practices and find ingenious ways of adapting to their extreme environment. They grapple with deadly weather while trying to find food, water and shelter. Can they make a success of their uniquely challenging lives?

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: Deep in Alaska, the primal way lives on. Fight the freeze, brave the wild, hold on to your sanity. And winter is no wonderland when temperatures plummet far below zero. This series follows the drama and hardships experienced by Alaskan households in different corners of this merciless territory as they battle to survive, thrive, and live life on their own terms.

programme.title: Wonders of the Solar System
programme.desc: In this captivating series, Professor Brian Cox journeys to some of Earth’s most dramatic and remote landscapes to uncover how the fundamental laws of physics have shaped not only our planet, but the entire solar system. From towering mountains to vast deserts, he reveals the powerful forces at work in nature—and how they connect us to the wonders of the cosmos.

programme.title: Iceland with Alexander Armstrong
programme.desc: The television presenter and comic embarks on an 8,000-mile journey halfway around the Arctic Circle in the middle of winter, a remarkable, but unforgiving, time of year in the ice-bound region. He observes natural wonders and discovers the magnetic lure of the far north, swims with locals and much more.

programme.title: Tutankhamun with Dan Snow
programme.desc: The historian explores the story of the Egyptian pharaohs life and death. He encounters the mummies of the boy kings parents in Cairo, investigates an injury the pharaoh sustained towards the end of his life - an injury that would eventually result in his death - and explores why images of the king look more like a woman

programme.title: Life Below Zero: Canada
programme.desc: Based on the four-time Emmy-winning format, Life Below Zero: Northern Territories is a compelling documentary about people who live off the grid in remote regions of northern Canada. The series follows a diverse group from different backgrounds, including First Nations. Get an unfiltered glimpse into their rugged daily lives, as these intrepid characters use traditional survival practices and find ingenious ways of adapting to their extreme environment. They grapple with deadly weather while trying to find food, water and shelter. Can they make a success of their uniquely challenging lives?

programme.title: Great Continental Railway Journeys
programme.desc: One of the most famous bibliographic references of all time, George Bradshaws Guide to the Continental Railway, serves as the guidebook for this documentary series. A total of five episodes will showcase the different European routes covered in this guide, published in 1913, which marked a turning point for British tourists during the Edwardian era. Gleaming cosmopolitan cities, alpine landscapes, warm, sparkling seas, and picturesque villages are some of the places Bradshaw describes in his book, known precisely for sparking an interest among English citizens in the exoticism of foreign travel.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben Fogle journeys across the globe to meet individuals who have abandoned the pressures of modern life in favor of simpler, more self-sufficient living. Along the way, he explores their unique lifestyles, the challenges they face, and the freedoms they’ve discovered by stepping away from the conventional rat race.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild

programme.title: Treasures Decoded
programme.desc: Discover the remarkable secrets of the worlds greatest treasures; a team of scientists examines each object using a range of new techniques, including state-of-the art forensics.

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Gregg Wallace and Cherry Healey hit factory floors across Britain for a snoop around their supersized production lines. What are the secrets behind our supermarket staples?

programme.title: Dogs in the Wild
programme.desc: From the rugged peaks of the Himalayas to the blistering Sahara desert, wild dogs thrive in the least likely of places. They are the most widespread carnivores on the planet. The latest scientific revelations reveal fresh perspectives on characters who constantly surprise us with their diversity and their unusual behaviour. These are the world’s ultimate canids!

programme.desc: Discover the remarkable secrets of the worlds greatest treasures; a team of scientists examines each object using a range of new techniques, including state-of-the art forensics.

programme.title: Great Continental Railway Journeys
programme.desc: One of the most famous bibliographic references of all time, George Bradshaws Guide to the Continental Railway, serves as the guidebook for this documentary series. A total of five episodes will showcase the different European routes covered in this guide, published in 1913, which marked a turning point for British tourists during the Edwardian era. Gleaming cosmopolitan cities, alpine landscapes, warm, sparkling seas, and picturesque villages are some of the places Bradshaw describes in his book, known precisely for sparking an interest among English citizens in the exoticism of foreign travel.

programme.title: Worlds Most Dangerous Roads
programme.desc: A series of celebrities are tasked with driving in countries where things aren’t perhaps as straight forward as they are in the UK. Suddenly the M25 first thing in the morning doesnt seem so bad.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben Fogle journeys across the globe to meet individuals who have abandoned the pressures of modern life in favor of simpler, more self-sufficient living. Along the way, he explores their unique lifestyles, the challenges they face, and the freedoms they’ve discovered by stepping away from the conventional rat race.

programme.title: The Secret Life of Trees

programme.title: Secret Amazon: Into The Wild
programme.desc: British explorer Lucy Shepherd and an Indigenous team embark on an unprecedented Amazon expedition, crossing virgin jungle territory while facing extreme danger at every turn

programme.title: Ben Fogles Lost Worlds
programme.desc: Ben journeys from Stroma, inhabited 1,000 years ago, to Swona, its first inhabitants being the Vikings and then to the towering prehistoric cliffs of St Kilda, the most remote of Scotlands islands.

programme.title: Den iskolde vildmark

programme.title: QI
programme.desc: QI is a quiz show packed with quirky and surprising facts where contestants are rewarded not just for correct answers but for responses that are “quite interesting.” The show blends humor, curiosity, and clever banter, encouraging players to think outside the box. Its unique format creates an entertaining and unpredictable experience that celebrates knowledge in all its curious forms.

programme.title: Rick Steins Long Weekends
programme.desc: Popular chef Rick Stein gives the inside track on some of our favourite destinations for a weekend jaunt, including Berlin, Reykjavik and Bologna. From fabulous local markets and great restaurants to wineries, cafes and bars, Rick showcases food excellence and brilliant recipes that people will love to cook at home.

programme.title: The Great British Sewing Bee
programme.desc: A group of passionate amateur sewers face off in a high-stakes competition to be crowned Britain’s most sensational seamster. Each week, they tackle a range of technical tasks and imaginative design challenges, testing their creativity, precision, and resilience as they sew under pressure to impress a panel of expert judges

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: Twelve homebakers take part in a bake off, which will test every aspect of their baking skills as they battle it out to be crowned the Great British Bake Offs Best Amateur Baker. Each episode tests different aspects of their baking skills through a signature bake, a technical challenge, and a showstopper.

programme.title: Rick Steins Long Weekends

From fabulous local markets and great restaurants to wineries, cafes and bars, Rick showcases food excellence and brilliant recipes that people will love to cook at home.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Airing since 1979, the British series travels the country (with occasional trips to other countries, such as Canada and Australia), bringing together in each location specialists in antiques and fine arts to have them appraise items brought in by local residents, whether they are collectors looking to turn trash into treasure or ordinary folks hoping Grandmas old painting might now fund the kids education. Items featured on the show often have an interesting story attached to them or have some connection to that episodes venue. While some items that are brought in are worth a fortune, others are worthless.

programme.title: Death in Paradise
programme.desc: A warm, witty, and light-hearted detective series following a British inspector sent to the sun-soaked Caribbean island of Saint-Marie. Amid stunning beaches and vibrant island life, he tackles puzzling murders with sharp instincts and a touch of humor, blending classic whodunit intrigue with the laid-back charm of paradise.

programme.title: The Great Pottery Throw Down
programme.desc: Ten home potters from across the country journey to Stoke-on-Trent, the historic home of pottery, to compete for the title of Top Potter. Battling through creative challenges and technical tests, they showcase their skills and passion for ceramics. This inspiring competition celebrates craftsmanship, artistry, and the rich pottery heritage of this iconic British city.

programme.title: Richard Osmans House of Games Night
programme.desc: A group of four famous faces go toe-to-toe testing their general knowledge in a variety of entertaining games. The series includes all the favourite, funny challenges from the House of Games series, with the addition of new games and features. As ever, all of the games are rooted in general knowledge and can be played along at home by viewers.

programme.title: Would I Lie to You?
programme.desc: Rob Brydon is back in the hosts chair for a brand new series of the award-winning comedy panel show "Would I Lie to You?", with Lee Mack and David Mitchell returning as the lightning-quick team captains. Over the course of each show, a stellar cast of celebrity guests reveal amazing stories about themselves. But are they telling the truth, or are they making it all up?

programme.title: The Graham Norton Show
programme.desc: The irreverent BAFTA award-winning chat show hosted by Graham Norton. Each episode is brim full of chat, comedy, celebrity gossip and hilarious absurdities. Theres just enough risque material to make viewers and guests cringe with delight and at the end of each episode, Graham introduces some of the best contemporary music acts to wrap things up and finish the show off with a bang.

From fabulous local markets and great restaurants to wineries, cafes and bars, Rick showcases food excellence and brilliant recipes that people will love to cook at home.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Airing since 1979, the British series travels the country (with occasional trips to other countries, such as Canada and Australia), bringing together in each location specialists in antiques and fine arts to have them appraise items brought in by local residents, whether they are collectors looking to turn trash into treasure or ordinary folks hoping Grandmas old painting might now fund the kids education. Items featured on the show often have an interesting story attached to them or have some connection to that episodes venue. While some items that are brought in are worth a fortune, others are worthless.

programme.title: The Great British Sewing Bee
programme.desc: A group of passionate amateur sewers face off in a high-stakes competition to be crowned Britain’s most sensational seamster. Each week, they tackle a range of technical tasks and imaginative design challenges, testing their creativity, precision, and resilience as they sew under pressure to impress a panel of expert judges

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: Twelve homebakers take part in a bake off, which will test every aspect of their baking skills as they battle it out to be crowned the Great British Bake Offs Best Amateur Baker. Each episode tests different aspects of their baking skills through a signature bake, a technical challenge, and a showstopper.

programme.title: Death in Paradise
programme.desc: A warm, witty, and light-hearted detective series following a British inspector sent to the sun-soaked Caribbean island of Saint-Marie. Amid stunning beaches and vibrant island life, he tackles puzzling murders with sharp instincts and a touch of humor, blending classic whodunit intrigue with the laid-back charm of paradise.

programme.title: Rick Steins Long Weekends

From fabulous local markets and great restaurants to wineries, cafes and bars, Rick showcases food excellence and brilliant recipes that people will love to cook at home.

programme.title: QI
programme.desc: QI is a quiz show packed with quirky and surprising facts where contestants are rewarded not just for correct answers but for responses that are “quite interesting.” The show blends humor, curiosity, and clever banter, encouraging players to think outside the box. Its unique format creates an entertaining and unpredictable experience that celebrates knowledge in all its curious forms.

programme.title: The Great Pottery Throw Down

This inspiring competition celebrates craftsmanship, artistry, and the rich pottery heritage of this iconic British city.

programme.title: Kingdom
programme.desc: Filmed over four years, this unique series captures every epic twist and turn of the animals interconnected lives. From uplifting highs to heart-rending lows, this is the true story of our animal families fight for power and survival.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: Deep in Alaska, the primal way lives on. Fight the freeze, brave the wild, hold on to your sanity. And winter is no wonderland when temperatures plummet far below zero. This series follows the drama and hardships experienced by Alaskan households in different corners of this merciless territory as they battle to survive, thrive, and live life on their own terms.

programme.title: Perfect Pub Walks with Bill Bailey

programme.title: Kongerike
programme.desc: Den sanne historien om fire afrikanske dyrefamilier som alle konkurrerer om dominans.

programme.title: Livet under null
programme.desc: Serier som følger vanskelighetene som fire husstander i Alaska opplever i forskjellige hjørner av dette nådeløse territoriet mens de kjemper for å komme seg gjennom en lang, mørk, iskald vinter. Den enorme amerikanske delstaten Alaska kan skryte av noe av verdens mest dødelige vær, med temperaturer som jevnlig stuper til dødelige -80 Fahrenheit, og fryser utsatte lemmer på minutter. Likevel er det også hjemsted for noen av de tøffeste, mest motstandsdyktige og mest isolerte menneskene i verden. Livet handler om å overleve i møte med ubøyelig vær, knappe ressurser og menneskeetende rovdyr.

programme.title: Den tapre prins Ivandoes heroiske færd

programme.title: The Heroic Quest of the Valiant Prince Ivandoe
programme.desc: The series follows the adventures of Ivandoe, the young prince of the forest who is on a quest for the magical Golden Feather of the fearsome Eagle King. Ivandoe and his dedicated squire, a small bird named Bert discover new and mysterious areas of the forest and an array of peculiar creatures along the way.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball
programme.desc: Welcome back to Elmore, where the laws of reality are a joke, and family life is anything but ordinary. Whether hes battling an evil fast-food empire, facing off against a sentient AI in love with his mom, or trying to stop Banana Joe from wearing pants, Gumball Watterson drags his brother Darwin, sister Anais, and the rest of the town of Elmore along for the ride.

programme.title: Jade Armor
programme.desc: The mystical Jade Armor is a legendary superhero. And now, it is Lan Jun’s turn to be Jade Armor. Even she can’t quite believe her destiny is to be this epic hero! With the help of her friends, Theo and Alisha and the mystical Beasticons that accompany the Armor, Lan Jun is thrust into a series of action-packed adventures. Each day, she must contend with both an evil array of super villains and the very real trials of teenage life.

programme.title: Looney Tunes Cartoons
programme.desc: Folks, have ya heard? Your favorite Looney Tunes characters are back! Featuring updated stories and everyone’s favorite characters, these all-new animated episodes revitalize the iconic series known and loved for decades. Back to their old tricks are Bugs Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, and other marquee Looney Tunes characters who promise to delight audiences young and old with their zany adventures, slapstick comedy, and madcap energy. Get ready to have some fun – that’s all, folks!

programme.title: The Heroic Quest of the Valiant Prince Ivandoe
programme.desc: The series follows the adventures of Ivandoe, the young prince of the forest who is on a quest for the magical Golden Feather of the fearsome Eagle King. Ivandoe and his dedicated squire, a small bird named Bert discover new and mysterious areas of the forest and an array of peculiar creatures along the way.

programme.title: Jade Armor
programme.desc: The mystical Jade Armor is a legendary superhero. And now, it is Lan Jun’s turn to be Jade Armor. Even she can’t quite believe her destiny is to be this epic hero! With the help of her friends, Theo and Alisha and the mystical Beasticons that accompany the Armor, Lan Jun is thrust into a series of action-packed adventures. Each day, she must contend with both an evil array of super villains and the very real trials of teenage life.

programme.title: Looney Tunes Cartoons
programme.desc: Folks, have ya heard? Your favorite Looney Tunes characters are back! Featuring updated stories and everyone’s favorite characters, these all-new animated episodes revitalize the iconic series known and loved for decades. Back to their old tricks are Bugs Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, and other marquee Looney Tunes characters who promise to delight audiences young and old with their zany adventures, slapstick comedy, and madcap energy. Get ready to have some fun – that’s all, folks!

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball
programme.desc: Welcome back to Elmore, where the laws of reality are a joke, and family life is anything but ordinary. Whether hes battling an evil fast-food empire, facing off against a sentient AI in love with his mom, or trying to stop Banana Joe from wearing pants, Gumball Watterson drags his brother Darwin, sister Anais, and the rest of the town of Elmore along for the ride.

programme.title: The Heroic Quest of the Valiant Prince Ivandoe
programme.desc: The series follows the adventures of Ivandoe, the young prince of the forest who is on a quest for the magical Golden Feather of the fearsome Eagle King. Ivandoe and his dedicated squire, a small bird named Bert discover new and mysterious areas of the forest and an array of peculiar creatures along the way.

programme.title: Jade Armor
programme.desc: The mystical Jade Armor is a legendary superhero. And now, it is Lan Jun’s turn to be Jade Armor. Even she can’t quite believe her destiny is to be this epic hero! With the help of her friends, Theo and Alisha and the mystical Beasticons that accompany the Armor, Lan Jun is thrust into a series of action-packed adventures. Each day, she must contend with both an evil array of super villains and the very real trials of teenage life.

programme.title: Clarence
programme.desc: Velkommen til Clarence verden! Den virker kanskje ganske så ordinær, men gjennom øynene til Clarence, blir denne gjennomsnittlige verdenen fylt med muligheter og underlighet. Clarence er lystig, oppriktig, annerledes, urokkelig positiv og klarer å finne moro i verden som andre folk ikke klarer, mens han tøyser seg gjennom livet med sine to bestevenner på slep – Sumo og Jeff.

programme.title: Psychic Private Eyes
programme.desc: Britains best known psychic mediums investigate mysterious criminal cases, often where the dead are the only witnesses. With Colin Fry and Tony Stockwell, and introducing the remarkable TJ Higgs.

programme.title: Hidden In America
programme.desc: From doomsday cults to biker gangs, from underground fight clubs to suburban swingers, Hidden In America shines a light into the most secret corners of American society.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.desc: This courtroom programme stars former family court judge Judy Sheindlin. Each episode finds Judge Judy presiding over real small-claims cases inside a televised courtroom. Her no-nonsense, wisecracking approach has been unsuccessfully copied by other TV court judges. Judge Judy is real, honest and keen to get to the bottom of emotional cases.

programme.title: Cult Justice
programme.desc: Cult Justice explores the magnetic power of criminal cult leaders—and the dramatic investigations that finally brought them to justice. Through the lens of the criminal justice system, every episode takes viewers deep inside a different modern-day cult. And—from sex trafficking and forced labour, to extortion, polygamy, and even murder—introduces the journalists, law enforcement agents, and prosecutors who gradually built the case against them. Meanwhile, brave survivors share first-hand accounts of how they were born or lured into the fold by twisted ideologies and false promises—and how they ultimately helped bring down these false prophets who thought they were above the law.

programme.title: Cold Justice
programme.desc: Kelly Siegler is an attorney and former Texas prosecutor who successfully tried 68 murder cases in her 21 years on the job, including 20 capital murder death penalty cases in which she secured the death penalty in 19 of those trials. She gets help from veteran detectives, who dig into small-town murder cases that have gone unsolved for years in the hope of getting justice for the victims and their loved ones.

programme.title: Evidence of Evil
programme.desc: True crime documentary series exploring some of the most startling criminal cases over the decades where technology has changed the course of the investigations.

programme.title: Cats and Dogs at War
programme.desc: Meet families whose fighting pets have turned their homes into a daily battlefield. Distraught owners have called on animal behaviour experts Chirag Patel and Nanci Creedon for help.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.desc: This courtroom programme stars former family court judge Judy Sheindlin. Each episode finds Judge Judy presiding over real small-claims cases inside a televised courtroom. Her no-nonsense, wisecracking approach has been unsuccessfully copied by other TV court judges. Judge Judy is real, honest and keen to get to the bottom of emotional cases.

programme.title: Relative Justice
programme.desc: Under the watchful eye of Judge Rhonda Wills, RELATIVE JUSTICE will pull back the curtain on family disputes, moving the drama from the dining room to the court room.

programme.title: Relative Justice
programme.desc: Under the watchful eye of Judge Rhonda Wills, RELATIVE JUSTICE will pull back the curtain on family disputes, moving the drama from the dining room to the court room.

programme.title: Helicopter ER
programme.desc: Climb aboard rescue helicopters with paramedics and airborne doctors of the Yorkshire Air Ambulance crew as they race to rescue the badly injured and assist the critically ill in some of Englands most unreachable landscapes.

programme.title: Adventure Gold Diggers
programme.desc: Adventure Gold Diggers follows three hardcore gold prospecting teams as they venture into dangerous and inhospitable territories across the country to unearth gold.

programme.title: Relative Justice
programme.desc: Under the watchful eye of Judge Rhonda Wills, RELATIVE JUSTICE will pull back the curtain on family disputes, moving the drama from the dining room to the court room.

programme.title: Seized at Sea
programme.desc: At San Juan in Puerto Rico, the overnight ferry from the Dominican Republic carries over 600 passengers some of whom are travelling between the two Caribbean islands for nefarious reasons.

programme.title: Close Calls: On Camera
programme.desc: Series presented by Nick Knowles which shows the split-second moments when everyday events are transformed into disasters and meets the people who lived to tell the tale.

programme.title: Border Security: Australias Front Line
programme.desc: Australia is a popular travel destination for many passengers. But not everyone is welcome. The documentary series "Border Patrol Australia" follows Australian border guards in their daily work. Their job is to keep out illegal immigrants and potential terrorists. They must also prevent the import of dangerous diseases via exotic animals.

programme.title: Call the Bailiffs: Time to Pay Up
programme.desc: A gripping documentary series that follows enforcement agents as they carry out High Court writs to recover unpaid debts. Acting on behalf of individuals and businesses desperate to reclaim money they’re owed, the agents face challenging situations, emotional confrontations, and high-stakes encounters as they seek justice and financial resolution for their clients.

programme.title: Worlds Most Evil Killers
programme.desc: World’s Most Evil Killers delves into the gripping real-life stories of the world’s most terrifying and prolific killers. From Fred and Rose West to Ed Gein – The Clown Killer – and even to The Milwaukee Cannibal. Each episode focuses on one notorious killer and features authentic first-hand accounts of their behavior, from detectives who ran the case, journalists who reported on the stories, relatives, and at times survivors, alongside series experts who provide analysis. These criminologists, crime journalists and psychologists examine how the infamous killers made headlines both nationally and internationally and why they still continue to evoke fear and fascination in the public eye.

Each episode focuses on one notorious killer and features authentic first-hand accounts of their behavior, from detectives who ran the case, journalists who reported on the stories, relatives, and at times survivors, alongside series experts who provide analysis. These criminologists, crime journalists and psychologists examine how the infamous killers made headlines both nationally and internationally and why they still continue to evoke fear and fascination in the public eye.

programme.title: Border Security: Australias Front Line
programme.desc: Australia is a popular travel destination for many passengers. But not everyone is welcome. The documentary series "Border Patrol Australia" follows Australian border guards in their daily work. Their job is to keep out illegal immigrants and potential terrorists. They must also prevent the import of dangerous diseases via exotic animals.

programme.title: Call the Bailiffs: Time to Pay Up
programme.desc: A gripping documentary series that follows enforcement agents as they carry out High Court writs to recover unpaid debts. Acting on behalf of individuals and businesses desperate to reclaim money they’re owed, the agents face challenging situations, emotional confrontations, and high-stakes encounters as they seek justice and financial resolution for their clients.

programme.title: Helicopter ER
programme.desc: Climb aboard rescue helicopters with paramedics and airborne doctors of the Yorkshire Air Ambulance crew as they race to rescue the badly injured and assist the critically ill in some of Englands most unreachable landscapes.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.desc: This courtroom programme stars former family court judge Judy Sheindlin. Each episode finds Judge Judy presiding over real small-claims cases inside a televised courtroom. Her no-nonsense, wisecracking approach has been unsuccessfully copied by other TV court judges. Judge Judy is real, honest and keen to get to the bottom of emotional cases.

programme.title: Executive Decisions
programme.desc: ‘Executive Decisions’ is a CNBC podcast offering a rare window into the minds of top decision-makers. Hosted by Steve Sedgwick, each episode explores the pivotal choices that shape the careers and legacies of business leaders and policymakers. Through candid conversations about risk, doubt and conviction, the series reminds us that even the most powerful face uncertainty and trade-offs.

programme.title: Europe Early Edition
programme.desc: Start your trading day with Europe Early Edition as major European financial centres take the reins of global markets. Get the first indication of how markets in Europe will react to an active Asian session and the handover from the US. programme.title: Squawk Box Europe

programme.title: Morden im Norden
programme.desc: Kiesewetter plante ursprunglich auf seinem Hof im Brandenburgischen ein einfaches, aber naturnahes Leben als Biobauer zu fuhren. Ein Brand machte alles zunichte und so ging er zuruck in seinen alten Beruf als Kommissar und in seine alte Heimat Lubeck.

programme.title: Advent vor acht
programme.desc: Die Advents- und Weihnachtsbrauche in Deutschland sind so vielfaltig wie die Regionen. Deshalb werden im Ersten vom 16. bis 23. Dezember werktags in funf Ausgaben „Advent vor acht“ die schonsten Adventsbrauche Deutschlands vorgestellt. So wird der Advent auch im Ersten zu einer besonders stimmungsvollen Jahreszeit.

programme.title: Wetter vor acht
programme.desc: Wie wird das Wetter? Sonne in Stuttgart, Nebel in Nurnberg, Bremen bewolkt? Hier gibts die aktuellen Wetterprognosen.

programme.title: Wirtschaft vor acht
programme.desc: Immer den Mehrwert fur die Zuschauer:innen im Blick stellt „Wirtschaft vor acht“ filmisch und mit bewegten Grafiken Begriffe aus allen Bereichen der Wirtschaft, des Arbeitslebens und des Alltags anschaulich dar. Ein Schwerpunkt ist das Themengebiet Ökonomie/Ökologie.

programme.title: Tagesschau

programme.title: Erlebnis Erde
programme.desc: Packende und faszinierende Tier- und Naturaufnahmen im Ersten.

programme.title: Hart aber fair
programme.desc: "hart aber fair" bereitet aktuelle Themen auf - fur jeden verstandlich, umfassend und informativ. Filme und Reportagen liefern wichtige Hintergrunde, bereichern die Diskussion mit harten Fakten und beleuchten das Thema aus verschiedenen Blickwinkeln. Die Zuschauer konnen sich mit ihren Meinungen, Fragen, Ängsten und Sorgen per Telefon, Internet, Fax oder E-Mail in die Sendung einmischen.

programme.title: Tagesthemen
programme.desc: Die Sendung "Tagesthemen" vermittelt erganzende Informationen zu den tagesaktuellen Ereignissen aus der ganzen Welt, zeigen dessen Zusammenhange und Hintergrunde.

programme.title: Mein Korper. Mein Gedachtnis. - Wie wir es verbessern konnen
programme.desc: Unser Gedachtnis ist eine Maschine der Superlative: Es verarbeitet in jeder Sekunde unvorstellbar groSSe Mengen an Informationen, entscheidet, was wichtig ist und was nicht, speichert ab, was wir erleben und lernen. Damit macht es uns auch zu dem, was wir sind. Die gespeicherten Erlebnisse und Gefuhle, das bewahrte Wissen - all das verbindet uns mit uns selbst und mit unserer Vergangenheit. Wie aber kann man das Gedachtnis verbessern und leistungsfahiger machen? Wie konnen wir es fit und gesund halten? Was passiert, wenn es uns verlasst?

programme.title: Hannah Arendt - Denken ist gefahrlich
programme.desc: Dokumentarfilm uber das furchtlose Leben der wichtigsten politischen Denkerin des 20. Jahrhunderts Hannah Arendt und ihre Analyse der politischen Verhaltnisse. Eindruckliche Archivbilder erzahlen von einem selbstbestimmten Leben zwischen Weimarer Republik und Vietnamkrieg. Arendts Worte, gesprochen von Nina Hoss, warnen mit erschreckender Aktualitat vor dem Erstarken autoritarer Systeme.

programme.title: Being Katarina Witt
programme.desc: Die funfteilige Dokumentation beleuchtet den auSSergewohnlichen Lebensweg der zweifachen Olympiasiegerin - von Karl-Marx-Stadt zu Weltruhm. Es war der Moment, der Sportgeschichte schrieb: Am 27. Februar 1988, um 17.27 Uhr Ortszeit, erringt Katarina Witt in Calgary zum zweiten Mal Olympiagold. Aus der bis dahin bereits erfolgreichsten Eiskunstlauferin aller Zeiten wird uber Nacht ein globaler Superstar, dessen Ausstrahlung weit uber den Sport hinausreicht. Knapp vier Jahrzehnte spater erzahlt die neue funfteilige Doku-Serie erstmals die vollstandige Geschichte dieser auSSergewohnlichen Karriere.

programme.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier
programme.desc: I programmet følger vi familien Kilcher, der lever et ekstraordinært liv midt i Alaskas barske natur. De har ingen moderne bekvemmeligheder som varme eller VVS, og de overlever ved enten at dyrke deres egen mad eller gå på jagt i vildnisset. Kilcher har levet på deres jord i fire generationer, og alle familiemedlemmer ved præcis, hvordan de skal forberede sig på de lange, hårde vintre, som altid hærger her på på kanten af verden.

programme.title: Dino Hunters
programme.desc: Ankylosaurus, Triceratops, or Velociraptor: Where cattle graze today, dinosaurs ruled the earth until 65 million years ago. Now, the remains of these prehistoric giants lie buried in sedimentary rock, waiting to be unearthed. Dino hunters like Clayton Phipps, Jared Hudson, and Mike Harris are taking on the task. Ranchers and cowboys want to turn these prehistoric treasures into cash! The fossil discoveries are also important for science. Using 3D scanners and high-tech computer models, experts are bringing the hidden world of dinosaurs back to life.

programme.title: Blowing Up History
programme.desc: From the Pyramids to the Parthenon and Big Ben in London, UNEARTHED reveals the deepest secrets of each structure by using the latest technology to solve mysteries such as how the Parthenon still stands against earthquakes; how sticky rice was used to build the Great Wall of China; and what sacred secret lies beneath the Mayan temples of Chichen Itza?

programme.title: Dino Hunters
programme.desc: Ankylosaurus, Triceratops, or Velociraptor: Where cattle graze today, dinosaurs ruled the earth until 65 million years ago. Now, the remains of these prehistoric giants lie buried in sedimentary rock, waiting to be unearthed. Dino hunters like Clayton Phipps, Jared Hudson, and Mike Harris are taking on the task. Ranchers and cowboys want to turn these prehistoric treasures into cash! The fossil discoveries are also important for science. Using 3D scanners and high-tech computer models, experts are bringing the hidden world of dinosaurs back to life.

programme.title: Street Science
programme.desc: Kevin Delaney and his team of experts show how explosive hydrogen peroxide can really be. Plus, combining ping pong balls with pressurised liquid nitrogen.

programme.title: Street Science
programme.desc: Kevin and his team of experts explore the amazing science behind rockets, using unconventional materials to power homemade projectiles to incredible heights.

programme.title: Street Science
programme.desc: Kevin and the team take to the streets to create a massive, swirling fire tornado out of kerosene. Plus, they dazzle onlookers with a rainbow coloured flamethrower.

programme.title: Street Science
programme.desc: Kevin and his team of experts use a race car to put a new twist on an old magic trick, and show what it takes to build homemade hovercraft.

programme.title: The Explosion Show
programme.desc: Tory Belleci and Tommy Passemante see some serious kaboom action and meet the trained professionals who get to detonate all kinds of things every day.

programme.title: Phineas og Ferb
programme.desc: Phineas og Ferb vil gøre hver eneste dag i deres sommerferie helt spektakulær! Hver dag finder de på nye fantasirige opfindelser, alt imens deres misundelige storesøster, Candace, prøver at sladre om dem til mor. De kan bygge en rutsjebane i baghaven, surfe på forstadens tidevandsbølger, eller rejse tilbage til forhistorien. Samtidig lever familiens ikke alt for smarte husdyr, næbdyret Perry, et dobbeltliv som hemmelig agent, der i hvert afsnit kæmper mod den ondskabsfulde Dr. Doofenshmirtz.

programme.title: Familien Green I Storbyen
programme.desc: “Familien Green i storbyen” er en animations-komedie/eventyr-serie, der følger 10-årige Cricket Greens skæve og sjove eventyr. Den gavtyveagtige og optimistiske knægt fra landet flytter til storbyen med sin familie - storesøster Tilly, farmand Bill og bedstemor Alice - som mildt sagt ikke passer ind der. Crickets medfødte nysgerrighed og gåpåmod fører ham og hans familie ud på store eventyr og lige i hjerterne på hans nye naboer.

programme.title: Hamster og Grete
programme.desc: Grete Grant-Gomez og hende kælehamster "Hamster", får superkræfter af nogle rumvæsner, og det store ansvar at være "helte på jorden!" Gretes storebror, Kevin, blev derimod overset af rumvæsnerne, og er derfor kun "superhelte-påhæng". Men han er alligevel tit hjernen bag deres missioner! Nu må Hamster and Grete redde veden fra den ene superskurk efter den anden, imens de holder deres sande identititeter skjult!

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Bluey er en seks-årig glad og energisk australsk Blue Heeler hund, der elsker at lege og forvandler familiens hverdag til fantastiske eventyr, der gavner både Blueys fantasi og hendes mentale, fysiske og følelsesmæssige styrke.

programme.title: Superkitties
programme.desc: Superkillingerne - Bitten, Rosa, Kvik og Mester - er tilbage, og de er superenergiske! Teamet er på en mission for at rette op på uret og gøre verden til et venligere og mere potetastisk sted.

programme.title: Mickeys klubhus+
programme.desc: Mickey og hans venner byder alle velkommen i klubhuset til helt nye og plussede eventyr fyldt med sange, latter, fikse fingre og sjove nye overraskelser!

programme.title: Spidey og hans fantastiske venner
programme.desc: Spidey, vores yndlings spindsvinger, slår sig sammen med Ghost-Spider (Gwen Stacey) og Miles Morales for at skabe Spidey-teamet med hjælp fra Spideys komiske, men loyale spider-bot, TRACE-E. Hvis Spidey befinder sig i en presset situation, der kræver endnu mere superheltekraft, så kan du være sikker på, at en Avenger-ven melder sig på banen. Om det bare er Spidey-teamet, eller om der er en Avenger med på sidelinjen, så samarbejder disse superhelte altid for at redde dagen!

programme.title: Iron Man og hans fantastiske venner
programme.desc: "Marvels Iron Man og hans utrolige venner" følger supergenierne og bedstevennerne mens de arbejder sammen om at løse problemer og beskytte deres by.

programme.title: Spidey og hans fantastiske venner
programme.desc: Spidey, vores yndlings spindsvinger, slår sig sammen med Ghost-Spider (Gwen Stacey) og Miles Morales for at skabe Spidey-teamet med hjælp fra Spideys komiske, men loyale spider-bot, TRACE-E. Hvis Spidey befinder sig i en presset situation, der kræver endnu mere superheltekraft, så kan du være sikker på, at en Avenger-ven melder sig på banen. Om det bare er Spidey-teamet, eller om der er en Avenger med på sidelinjen, så samarbejder disse superhelte altid for at redde dagen!

programme.title: Phineas og Ferb
programme.desc: Phineas og Ferb vil gøre hver eneste dag i deres sommerferie helt spektakulær! Hver dag finder de på nye fantasirige opfindelser, alt imens deres misundelige storesøster, Candace, prøver at sladre om dem til mor. De kan bygge en rutsjebane i baghaven, surfe på forstadens tidevandsbølger, eller rejse tilbage til forhistorien. Samtidig lever familiens ikke alt for smarte husdyr, næbdyret Perry, et dobbeltliv som hemmelig agent, der i hvert afsnit kæmper mod den ondskabsfulde Dr. Doofenshmirtz.

programme.title: Phineas og Ferb
programme.desc: Phineas og Ferb vil gøre hver eneste dag i deres sommerferie helt spektakulær! Hver dag finder de på nye fantasirige opfindelser, alt imens deres misundelige storesøster, Candace, prøver at sladre om dem til mor. De kan bygge en rutsjebane i baghaven, surfe på forstadens tidevandsbølger, eller rejse tilbage til forhistorien. Samtidig lever familiens ikke alt for smarte husdyr, næbdyret Perry, et dobbeltliv som hemmelig agent, der i hvert afsnit kæmper mod den ondskabsfulde Dr. Doofenshmirtz.

programme.title: Miraculous: Ladybug and Cat Noir på eventyr
programme.desc: Ladybug har mistet mirakelæsken og kwamierne. Nu har hun kun sin egen Mirakulus og Cat Noir har sin. Shadow Moth, som nu går under navnet Monark, har aldrig været tættere på at sejre. Nu er han i stand til at give Mirakulus-evner til sine akumatiserede undersåtter, og på den måde skabe afsindigt stærke superskurke. Men vores helte, som igen samarbejder som makkerpar, viser sig at være mere forbundne end nogensinde før. Denne nye prøvelse vil sætte et stort aftryk på deres indbyrdes relation og deres hverdag. Intet vil blive det samme igen.

programme.title: Miraculous: Ladybug and Cat Noir på eventyr
programme.desc: Ladybug har mistet mirakelæsken og kwamierne. Nu har hun kun sin egen Mirakulus og Cat Noir har sin. Shadow Moth, som nu går under navnet Monark, har aldrig været tættere på at sejre. Intet vil blive det samme igen.

programme.title: Kiff
programme.desc: Serien handler om Kiff, et optimistisk egern, hvis livsappetit fører hende ud på utallige eventyr rundt om i hjembyen, sammen med hendes afslappede bedsteven, Barry. I en verden, hvor dyr og magiske særlinge takler hverdagen sammen, styrer duoen gennem skole, kammeratskaber og deres ofte excentriske lokalsamfund.

programme.title: Familien Green I Storbyen
programme.desc: “Familien Green i storbyen” er en animations-komedie/eventyr-serie, der følger 10-årige Cricket Greens skæve og sjove eventyr. Den gavtyveagtige og optimistiske knægt fra landet flytter til storbyen med sin familie - storesøster Tilly, farmand Bill og bedstemor Alice - som mildt sagt ikke passer ind der. Crickets medfødte nysgerrighed og gåpåmod fører ham og hans familie ud på store eventyr og lige i hjerterne på hans nye naboer.

programme.title: Familien Green I Storbyen

programme.title: Magi efter Waverly Place
programme.desc: Billie, en magtfuld ung troldmand i centrum for en mystisk profeti, bliver sendt til at leve i den dødelige verden med den eneste troldmandslærer, der kan hjælpe hende med at kontrollere sine kræfter - Justin Russo.

programme.title: Iron Man og hans fantastiske venner
programme.desc: "Marvels Iron Man og hans utrolige venner" følger supergenierne og bedstevennerne mens de arbejder sammen om at løse problemer og beskytte deres by.

programme.title: Mickeys klubhus+
programme.desc: Mickey og hans venner byder alle velkommen i klubhuset til helt nye og plussede eventyr fyldt med sange, latter, fikse fingre og sjove nye overraskelser!

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Bluey er en seks-årig glad og energisk australsk Blue Heeler hund, der elsker at lege og forvandler familiens hverdag til fantastiske eventyr, der gavner både Blueys fantasi og hendes mentale, fysiske og følelsesmæssige styrke.

programme.title: Hamster og Grete
programme.desc: Grete Grant-Gomez og hende kælehamster "Hamster", får superkræfter af nogle rumvæsner, og det store ansvar at være "helte på jorden!" Gretes storebror, Kevin, blev derimod overset af rumvæsnerne, og er derfor kun "superhelte-påhæng". Men han er alligevel tit hjernen bag deres missioner! Nu må Hamster and Grete redde veden fra den ene superskurk efter den anden, imens de holder deres sande identititeter skjult!

Gretes storebror, Kevin, blev derimod overset af rumvæsnerne, og er derfor kun "superhelte-påhæng". Men han er alligevel tit hjernen bag deres missioner! Nu må Hamster and Grete redde veden fra den ene superskurk efter den anden, imens de holder deres sande identititeter skjult!

programme.title: Familien Green I Storbyen
programme.desc: “Familien Green i storbyen” er en animations-komedie/eventyr-serie, der følger 10-årige Cricket Greens skæve og sjove eventyr. Den gavtyveagtige og optimistiske knægt fra landet flytter til storbyen med sin familie - storesøster Tilly, farmand Bill og bedstemor Alice - som mildt sagt ikke passer ind der. Crickets medfødte nysgerrighed og gåpåmod fører ham og hans familie ud på store eventyr og lige i hjerterne på hans nye naboer.

programme.title: Familien Green I Storbyen

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Bluey er en seks-årig glad og energisk australsk Blue Heeler hund, der elsker at lege og forvandler familiens hverdag til fantastiske eventyr, der gavner både Blueys fantasi og hendes mentale, fysiske og følelsesmæssige styrke.

programme.title: Bluey

programme.title: Superkitties
programme.desc: Superkillingerne - Bitten, Rosa, Kvik og Mester - er tilbage, og de er superenergiske! Teamet er på en mission for at rette op på uret og gøre verden til et venligere og mere potetastisk sted.

programme.title: Mickeys klubhus+
programme.desc: Mickey og hans venner byder alle velkommen i klubhuset til helt nye og plussede eventyr fyldt med sange, latter, fikse fingre og sjove nye overraskelser!

programme.title: Spidey og hans fantastiske venner
programme.desc: Spidey, vores yndlings spindsvinger, slår sig sammen med Ghost-Spider (Gwen Stacey) og Miles Morales for at skabe Spidey-teamet med hjælp fra Spideys komiske, men loyale spider-bot, TRACE-E. Hvis Spidey befinder sig i en presset situation, der kræver endnu mere superheltekraft, så kan du være sikker på, at en Avenger-ven melder sig på banen. Om det bare er Spidey-teamet, eller om der er en Avenger med på sidelinjen, så samarbejder disse superhelte altid for at redde dagen!

programme.title: Iron Man og hans fantastiske venner
programme.desc: "Marvels Iron Man og hans utrolige venner" følger supergenierne og bedstevennerne mens de arbejder sammen om at løse problemer og beskytte deres by.

programme.title: Phineas og Ferb
programme.desc: Phineas og Ferb vil gøre hver eneste dag i deres sommerferie helt spektakulær! Hver dag finder de på nye fantasirige opfindelser, alt imens deres misundelige storesøster, Candace, prøver at sladre om dem til mor. De kan bygge en rutsjebane i baghaven, surfe på forstadens tidevandsbølger, eller rejse tilbage til forhistorien. Samtidig lever familiens ikke alt for smarte husdyr, næbdyret Perry, et dobbeltliv som hemmelig agent, der i hvert afsnit kæmper mod den ondskabsfulde Dr. Doofenshmirtz.

programme.title: Phineas og Ferb
programme.desc: Phineas og Ferb vil gøre hver eneste dag i deres sommerferie helt spektakulær! Hver dag finder de på nye fantasirige opfindelser, alt imens deres misundelige storesøster, Candace, prøver at sladre om dem til mor. De kan bygge en rutsjebane i baghaven, surfe på forstadens tidevandsbølger, eller rejse tilbage til forhistorien. Samtidig lever familiens ikke alt for smarte husdyr, næbdyret Perry, et dobbeltliv som hemmelig agent, der i hvert afsnit kæmper mod den ondskabsfulde Dr. Doofenshmirtz.

programme.title: Miraculous: Ladybug and Cat Noir på eventyr
programme.desc: Ladybug har mistet mirakelæsken og kwamierne. Nu har hun kun sin egen Mirakulus og Cat Noir har sin. Shadow Moth, som nu går under navnet Monark, har aldrig været tættere på at sejre. Nu er han i stand til at give Mirakulus-evner til sine akumatiserede undersåtter, og på den måde skabe afsindigt stærke superskurke. Men vores helte, som igen samarbejder som makkerpar, viser sig at være mere forbundne end nogensinde før. Denne nye prøvelse vil sætte et stort aftryk på deres indbyrdes relation og deres hverdag. Intet vil blive det samme igen.

programme.title: Miraculous: Ladybug and Cat Noir på eventyr

programme.title: Kiff
programme.desc: Serien handler om Kiff, et optimistisk egern, hvis livsappetit fører hende ud på utallige eventyr rundt om i hjembyen, sammen med hendes afslappede bedsteven, Barry. I en verden, hvor dyr og magiske særlinge takler hverdagen sammen, styrer duoen gennem skole, kammeratskaber og deres ofte excentriske lokalsamfund.

programme.desc: Serien handler om Kiff, et optimistisk egern, hvis livsappetit fører hende ud på utallige eventyr rundt om i hjembyen, sammen med hendes afslappede bedsteven, Barry. programme.title: Kiff

programme.title: Phineas og Ferb
programme.desc: Phineas og Ferb vil gøre hver eneste dag i deres sommerferie helt spektakulær! Hver dag finder de på nye fantasirige opfindelser, alt imens deres misundelige storesøster, Candace, prøver at sladre om dem til mor. De kan bygge en rutsjebane i baghaven, surfe på forstadens tidevandsbølger, eller rejse tilbage til forhistorien. Samtidig lever familiens ikke alt for smarte husdyr, næbdyret Perry, et dobbeltliv som hemmelig agent, der i hvert afsnit kæmper mod den ondskabsfulde Dr. Doofenshmirtz.

programme.title: Familien Green I Storbyen
programme.desc: “Familien Green i storbyen” er en animations-komedie/eventyr-serie, der følger 10-årige Cricket Greens skæve og sjove eventyr. Den gavtyveagtige og optimistiske knægt fra landet flytter til storbyen med sin familie - storesøster Tilly, farmand Bill og bedstemor Alice - som mildt sagt ikke passer ind der. Crickets medfødte nysgerrighed og gåpåmod fører ham og hans familie ud på store eventyr og lige i hjerterne på hans nye naboer.

programme.title: Hamster og Grete
programme.desc: Grete Grant-Gomez og hende kælehamster "Hamster", får superkræfter af nogle rumvæsner, og det store ansvar at være "helte på jorden!" Gretes storebror, Kevin, blev derimod overset af rumvæsnerne, og er derfor kun "superhelte-påhæng". Men han er alligevel tit hjernen bag deres missioner! Nu må Hamster and Grete redde veden fra den ene superskurk efter den anden, imens de holder deres sande identititeter skjult!

programme.title: Phineas And Ferb
programme.desc: Phineas Flynn and his resourceful stepbrother, Ferb Fletcher, happily set out to conquer boredom and make every day of their 104-day summer vacation count. Among their fun-filled projects are building a full-scale roller coaster, creating a new season called swinter, becoming overnight pop music sensations, building a backyard beach complete with a surf competition, and traveling back in time to the Jurassic period.

programme.title: Big City Greens
programme.desc: “Big City Greens” is an animated comedy-adventure series which follows the offbeat adventures of 10-year-old Cricket Green, a mischievous and optimistic country boy who moves to the big city with his wildly out of place family – older sister Tilly, father Bill and Gramma Alice. Cricket’s natural curiosity and enthusiasm lead him and his family on epic journeys and into the hearts of his new neighbours.

programme.title: Hamster and Gretel
programme.desc: Gretel Grant-Gomez and her pet hamster, "Hamster," are given superpowers by aliens and the big responsibility of being "Heroes on Earth!" Gretels teen brother, Kevin, on the other hand, was overlooked by the aliens, and is stuck being "superhero adjacent." However, he is often the brains behind each mission! Now, Hamster and Gretel must save the world from one supervillain after another, all while keeping their identities a secret!

Cricket’s natural curiosity and enthusiasm lead him and his family on epic journeys and into the hearts of his new neighbours.

programme.title: Big City Greens

Cricket’s natural curiosity and enthusiasm lead him and his family on epic journeys and into the hearts of his new neighbours.

programme.title: Kiff
programme.desc: The series follows Kiff, an optimistic squirrel whose thirst for life takes her on countless adventures through her town, alongside Barry, her chill bunny bestie. Set in a world where animals and magical oddballs tackle day-to-day life together, the duo navigate school, relationships, and their often-eccentric community.

programme.title: Kiff

programme.title: Phineas And Ferb
programme.desc: Phineas Flynn and his resourceful stepbrother, Ferb Fletcher, happily set out to conquer boredom and make every day of their 104-day summer vacation count. Among their fun-filled projects are building a full-scale roller coaster, creating a new season called swinter, becoming overnight pop music sensations, building a backyard beach complete with a surf competition, and traveling back in time to the Jurassic period.

programme.title: Hamster and Gretel
programme.desc: Gretel Grant-Gomez and her pet hamster, "Hamster," are given superpowers by aliens and the big responsibility of being "Heroes on Earth!" Gretels teen brother, Kevin, on the other hand, was overlooked by the aliens, and is stuck being "superhero adjacent." However, he is often the brains behind each mission! Now, Hamster and Gretel must save the world from one supervillain after another, all while keeping their identities a secret!

programme.title: Jagtmagasinet
